20 template <class Base>
21 class TLoggerCompWrap: public ilog::TLoggerWrap<Base>
22 {
23 public:
24  typedef ilog::TLoggerWrap<Base> BaseClass;

26  I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(TLoggerCompWrap);

61 template <class Base>
62 bool TLoggerCompWrap<Base>::IsVerboseEnabled() const
63 {
64  static const istd::IInformationProvider::InformationCategory categoryNone = istd::IInformationProvider::IC_NONE;
65 
66  return *m_verboseEnabledAttrPtr && BaseClass::IsLogConsumed(&categoryNone);
67 }
68 
69 
70 template <class Base>
71 void TLoggerCompWrap<Base>::SendVerboseMessage(const QString& message, const QString& messageSource) const
72 {
73  if (*m_verboseEnabledAttrPtr){
74  BaseClass::SendLogMessage(istd::IInformationProvider::IC_NONE, 0, message, messageSource);
75  }
76 }
77 
78 
79 // reimplemented (istd::ILogger)
80 
81 template <class Base>
82 void TLoggerCompWrap<Base>::DecorateMessage(
83  istd::IInformationProvider::InformationCategory category,
84  int id,
85  int flags,
86  QString& message,
87  QString& messageSource) const
88 {
89  BaseClass::DecorateMessage(category, id, flags, message, messageSource);
90 
91  const icomp::CComponentContext* contextPtr = dynamic_cast<const icomp::CComponentContext*>(BaseClass::GetComponentContext());
92  if (contextPtr != NULL){
93  if (messageSource.isEmpty()){
94  messageSource = contextPtr->GetContextId();
95  }
96  else{
97  messageSource = QString(contextPtr->GetContextId()) + " (" + messageSource + ")";
98  }
99  }
100 }
101 
102 
103 // reimplemented (icomp::CComponentBase)
104 
105 template <class Base>
106 void TLoggerCompWrap<Base>::OnComponentCreated()
107 {
108  if (m_logCompPtr.IsValid()){
109  this->SetLogPtr(m_logCompPtr.GetPtr());
110  }
111 
112  BaseClass::OnComponentCreated();
113 }
